    public class UpgradeController
extends org.zkoss.zul.Window
    Controller for the upgrade window. Creates the window and all its components.
    Author:
    Daniel Gomez Blanco
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • UpgradeController

        public UpgradeController(DODInstance inst,
                 java.lang.String user,
                 JobHelper jobHelper)
                  throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Constructor for this window (coming from instance view)
        Parameters:
        inst - instance to be managed.
        user - username for the authenticated user.
        jobHelper - helper to execute jobs.
        model - model of the tree (null if we are in instance view).
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if the window cannot be created.

    • Method Detail

      • doAccept

        private void doAccept()
        Method executed when user accepts the form. A job is created and the window is detached.

      • doCancel

        private void doCancel()
        Method executed when the user cancels the form. The window is detached from the page.
